Hydras/Elita:

=E2=80=9CI respected our truce, Prime=E2=80=9DHissed Hydras =
offended=E2=80=9D I know that this is one of those ocations that it isnt co=
nvenient attack, and as proof of good faith, Cyclonus and waspanetor, could=
 help you to repair the Fuzors... =E2=80=9D

Then he opened his comlink asn=
 said =E2=80=9CTo all predacons and decepticons, Inform!=E2=80=9D
*********=
*********

=E2=80=9CWhat means Tail on???=E2=80=9Dsaid Elita confused  =E2=
=80=9Cand what means AFT? Is he my daddy??=E2=80=9D


From: Sandy Panico 
S=
ent: Friday, August 12, 2011 8:19 PM
To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
Subject: R=
e: Strange meetings - new friends & old enemies




Upon encountering Dark =
Rodimus, Straight Shot's reaction was one of deviousness instead of fear.  =
She looks around quickly and realizes the terrain was full of trees that ma=
y be damaged but were still stable enough to hold her weight.  She jumps up=
 to catch a hanging branch and like a skilled acrobat, she manages to swing=
 herself up higher into the trees.  From there, she could see a large branc=
h severely cracked, hanging right over Dark Rodimus's head.     She then sp=
ots a large tree root at the edge of what looked like a tar pool.  How conv=
enient was that?  And she certainly was fast enough to dart out of the way =
if she had to.  But if she could only break that branch without falling out=
 of the tree herself.  

" Hmmm...  He's right, we typically are kinda pred=
ictable..  So why not try something original?  Now how deep is that crack?"=


She examines the crack in the branch.  She finds that with just a strong =
hit with a sharp object, the branch would definitely come down. She raises =
a brow, aims her arm launcher and fires at the crack in the branch.  She hi=
ts her target as the branch cracks loudly and detaches from the damaged tre=
e with a loud creaking noise.  She hoped her first plan of attack would wor=
k.  Phase two would also prove difficult as she waits to see how the chips =
fall, literally. 

" Timber.."

Meanwhile, Tucson quickly catches Noctorro =
as he puts his body beneath his to support him.

" Easy I got you.  Seekers=
?  But how? They're out scouting the parameters, I saw them myself.  Someth=
ing is very wrong here. Leo Prime, it's definitely not Hydras and I'm almos=
t certain a greater evil is at play here.  I suggest we send rescue efforts=
 to the Fuzors immediately. And I don't think it's a matter of who, it's a =
matter of what is causing such chaos."

He looks to Hydras.

You haven't de=
ployed any seekers have you?  If you gave that order to attack the Fuzors o=
ur alliance ends here."

He scowls at Hydras.


Meanwhile Nightshift watche=
s from a good distance as Straight Shot attempts to play decoy with Dark Ro=
dimus.  Yet seeing him seems extremely disturbing to Nightshift.  He rolls =
into view and looks to the dark imposter.


" So that's it, huh?!  First yo=
u make us believe you're all over the evil thing and now you go right back =
ta be'n an A class Aft.  Nice, real nice.  Elita hate ta say it but I think=
 your dad just turned tail on us.  That's it, I take orders from Leo and Tu=
cson but that's about it.  Consider yourself on my do not trust list.  Peac=
e out." 


He turns around to drive Elita to safety.


" FROM HERE ON OUT, =
I ONLY TAKE ORDERS FROM REAL PRIMES, NOT OVER RATED HOT ROD WANNA BE AFTS L=
IKE YOU!"


He secures Elita on his drivers side seats.


" Sorry Elita but=
 your dad really is act'n like a real aft right now".


  




Perpetually =
on the move and constantly busy. 

On Aug 12, 2011, at 5:00 PM, Airshadow N=
ightstar <airly2002@...> wrote:


    
  Elita/Talon/Hydras:

  "Wh=
o is he??"said Elita while she looked the dark Rodimus and hide"looks 
  li=
ke my dad... But more Scary..."

  ****************************

  Talon lo=
oked around and said nervous "What's goin on?"

  *************************=
*************

  Hydras opened a comlink to all his forces "Be careful, See=
kers are aroundif 
  you see them open fire. Scourge what is goin on there?=
"

  Then Hydras send a com link back to Cryotek, that was highly encoded "=
What's 
  wrong?? what's goin on?"

  -----Mensaje original----- 
  From: S=
uper Cyclonus
  Sent: Friday, August 12, 2011 2:03 PM
  To: nbwrpg@yahoogro=
ups.com
  Subject: Re: Strange meetings - new friends & old enemies

  > <O=
LD>
  >
  > Something was terribly wrong. Straight Shot looks to Waspinator=
 with a
  > frightened expression. Just like him she did NOT like the sight=
 of Dark
  > Rodimus. But instead of running she prepares to defend both he=
rself and
  > Waspinator, and arms her forearm arrow launcher.
  >
  > " Ok=
ay get ready ta fly in the opposite direction. If he goes inta alt
  > mode=
, which I hope he does, I can pop his tires. That'll slow him down.
  > Don=
't worry, I won't let him hurt you."

  <NEW>

  "Don't worry Waspinator, s=
he won't let me hurt you." The voice was
  definitly that of DARK RODIMUS a=
 dark parody of the real one. Smooth
  and composed it was the very essence=
 of evil, and it was mocking
  WASPINATOR. "Since when do you side with the=
 Maximals?" The smile on
  his face was wicked.

  "Wazzpinator does not si=
de with foolish Maximals." WASPINATOR buzzed
  in the air, "Hydras made Waz=
zpinator side with them, and now the dark
  fire bot is back again." WASPIN=
ATOR rockets are ready, but he still is
  unsure if he should fire against =
someone who was once an ally.

  SCOURGE flew around DARK RODIMUS. "What ar=
e you doing here, we thought
  you were dead. We see the other Rodimus too.=
 . . . how?"

  There was a knowing smile from DARK RODIMUS as he reached d=
own and
  picked up something off the ground, He looked back up at STRAIGHT=

  SHOT, "Maximals are always so predictable, you all want to shoot me,
  a=
nd these Predacons won't shoot me because they are not sure who I am,
  and=
 you . . . " He chuckled, "You might shoot, but you will only try
  to main=
 me."

  DARK RODIMUS laughed as he was looked at all of them. "Don't you k=
now
  it might already be too late?"

  > <OLD>
  >
  > Meanwhile, Tucson c=
atches Noctorro but he senses something wrong. The 
  > other
  > Fuzors, t=
hey did not follow and he growls, knowing that he could have to
  > deploy =
another sonar roar.
  >
  > " I copy you Leo Prime... Definitely an evil fo=
rce is at play and I'm
  > determined to find out the cause. Whatever it is=
, has effected the 
  > Fuzors..
  > I have a feeling it could return for R=
odimus. I'm going to meet Noctorro
  > now."

  <NEW>

  "Force, or forces?=
 LEO said. "We have so many enemies these days.
  Insectile aliens, the min=
ions of Unicron, who ever it is that called
  the Dinosaurs and the Predaco=
ns you have allied yourself with." Leo
  sounded definitly concerned. "Be v=
ery careful."

  Keep me apprised." He said. "Leo Out."

  > <OLD>
  >
  > =
The silver dragon leaps up into the air to meet Noctorro. He hovers in a
  =
> defensive mode.
  >
  > "WHERE ARE THE OTHERS!? ANSWER ME!"
  >
  > Tucso=
n booms with a roar mixed in.

  <NEW>

  It took only a few more moments f=
or the Fuzor to reach TUSCON. As he
  got closer he could see that was heav=
ily damaged, his frame seemingly
  shot or burned by something.

  "They . =
. . attacked!!" NOCTORRO paused and then started again,
  "Seekers, they ju=
st appeared . . . from no where . . . We were caught
  off guard!" There wa=
s a pause again, "Ambushed."

  * * * * * * * *

  Meanwhile as TUSCON was =
talking with NOCTORRO . . .

  HYDRAS recieved a call on an encrypted chann=
el. "Hydras, can you read
  me? Hydras!" The voice on the other end of the =
line was CRYOTEK.

  (TAG)

  Preston

  ----------------------------------=
--

  Yahoo! Groups Links
